certified.label: Certified Attributes
certified.description: Attributes certified by a <1>recognized authoritative source.</1>

verified.label: Verified Attributes
verified.description: Attributes verified <1>by other organizations for the same consumer</1> with the possibility of requesting verification from the provider. For each attribute check or revoke...

declared.label: Declared Attributes
declared.description: Attributes declared by the consumer under his own responsibility during the request for use. A provider check is not necessary.

noAttributesRequiredAlert.provider: Your organization does not require {{attributeKey}} attributes
noAttributesRequiredAlert.consumer: The provider does not require {{attributeKey}} attributes

read.provider: The consumer must possess at least one of the following requirements
read.consumer: Your organization must possess at least one of the following requirements

success.provider: The consumer possess at least one of the following attributes
success.consumer: Your organization has at least one of the following attributes

verified.provider: The consumer must possess at least one of the following attributes
verified.consumer: The producer must verify if you possess at least one of the following attributes

declared.provider: The consumer must possess at least one of the following attributes
declared.consumer: Your organization has at least one of the following attributes

error.provider: The consumer has none of the following attributes
error.consumer: Your organization has none of the following attributes

manage.revokedByOwnParty: Attribute revoked by your own party
